alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:51AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Santa Rosa and central Escambia Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 450 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Goulding to 12 miles south of Warrington. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Goulding, Bagdad, Myrtle Grove, Oriole Beach, Molino, Point Baker, Pea Ridge, Roeville and Floridatown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
